entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Victoria (Hartland)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:51 a.m. PDT Thursday 11 May 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, 15.9Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Victoria Int'l Airport 1:00 PM PDT Thursday 11 May 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: 15.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 48 km
Humidity: 66 %
Dewpoint: 9.6°C
Wind: ESE 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High 19 except 16 near the water.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind light except west 30 km/h near Juan de Fuca Strait. High 19 except 16 near the water. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Thursday 11 May 2023
